channel.title: IS there a way to make the screen zoom out?
channel.description:
Well i added some of runescape new npc's (the god war bosses) and i found out that our clients are zoomed in too much
Is there a way i can make it so that the screen is zoomed out so i can see the whole npc not just the legs?

item.title: IS there a way to make the screen zoom out?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

legend rene:

move your screen backwards

I mean for like how they do cutscenes… Like the camera moves out and it shows things happening, i just want the camera to move out lol

Read full topic
item.source: IS there a way to make the screen zoom out?
